fields.text: Thank you for calling Equinix Peninsula, the world's largest IBX data center and colocation provider offering the fastest application performance and lowest latency routes worldwide.
For sales and new colocation deployments, press [INDEX].
For technical support and customer service, press [INDEX].
For information on rack space, power, and cooling, press [INDEX].
For interconnection and peering services, press [INDEX].
For technical support and network monitoring, press [INDEX].
For billing, invoicing, and account management, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a sales specialist for colocation capacity and power services.
Please hold while we connect you to our interconnection team for peering services.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support. An engineer will assist you shortly.
Please hold while we connect you to billing and account management.
